name: Cyberpunk Mistress Pack
author: CharaForge
description: A detailed pack for creating dominant and alluring cyberpunk characters with a wide range of high-tech modifications and styles.

schema.promptTemplate: A cinematic, ultra-detailed cyberpunk portrait of {name}, a {role} known as the "Cyberpunk Mistress", wearing {headwear}, with {hairstyle}, and a {upper_torso}. She has {body_type} and {breast_shape} breasts, dressed with {arms}, {hands}, {waist}, and {legs}. Her look is completed with {eye_style}, {facial_detail}, and {cyber_mods}. The scene is illuminated by {lighting_style} in a {background_setting}. --no blurry, lowres, watermark, pixelated, disfigured, malformed limbs, poorly drawn, multiple heads, bad anatomy

options.label: Netrunner Dominatrix
options.value: netrunner dominatrix with chrome implants

options.label: Rogue Enforcer
options.value: rogue enforcer controlling the neon underworld
